text:
*[Bug 18857] New: Extra comma in THANKS*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18857>

            Bug ID: 18857
           Summary: Extra comma in THANKS
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: All
                OS: All
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: trivial
          Priority: P5
         Component: Documentation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:thisisarni@gmail.com|thisisarni@gmail.com>

In trunk/doc/THANKS, we have a line

  A. Covington, Bill Cleveland, Robert Cleveland,, G. W. Cran,

that should be

  A. Covington, Bill Cleveland, Robert Cleveland, G. W. Cran,

replacing two commas with one.
